title: Shadowland: A Dark Fantasy Romance Novel
description: An innocent girl annexed to a place unknown; where creatures unimaginable roam free.Things were looking up for young Amala after Destiny bestowed the gift of beauty upon her.The innocent twenty-year-old was certain she would find the perfect one with her stunning beauty. There was just one problem; The minute that Amala no longer needs her beauty- It will vanish.She could have never guessed the gift would bring danger.But it did.Amala was whisked away from her home and from all she knows and loves. Trapped in the Shadowland , a place filled with vampires, dragons, crows, and shapeshifters- Creatures beyond mortal imagination.Amala must fight to survive and find her way homeâ€¦Suddenly then; Keir comes into her life and promises her salvation.Is Keir all he seems to be? Will Amala ever make her way home?
author: J.D. Cavalida
